name: flycheck-raycast
title: FlyCheck
description: Quickly lookup raw METAR weather data by ICAO code.
author: Sotong

commands.name: index
commands.title: Lookup METAR
commands.subtitle: FlyCheck
commands.description: Fetches raw METAR text for a specific ICAO code.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: CheckWX API Key
preferences.description: Get a free API key from https://www.checkwx.com/api

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
